text: The disbelievers expend their wealth in waging war against the Prophet s in order to bar from Godâ€™s way and they will expend it until in the end it will be a source of anguish for them a regret for having lost it and lost what they had intended by expending it; then they will be defeated in this world and the disbelievers among them will be gathered driven into Hell in the Hereafter
